title: Major Lag
body: My game just lags, like we will go into a big team fight and everything will just skip frames. My connection is great, league has been repaired. Everything takes forever to load in the client too. Please help !

replies.body: Your issue might be due to some packet loss or a weak network connection trying to reach our game server.  As a first step, I recommend following each step in our [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This should help fix things up for good, but please let me know if your issue persists.

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot. (Skip the repair step). 


http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
